document.full_text: kim hae-sook was only 13 years old when she was dragged off to a north korea prison camp for nearly 30 years, punished along with the rest of her family simply because her grandfather fled to rival south korea in the 1960s.
document.title: guilty-by-association: growing up in hell of north korean gulag
lines_and_colors: kim hae-sook was only 13 years old when she was dragged off to a north korea prison camp for nearly 30 years, punished along with the rest of her family simply because her grandfather fled to rival south korea in the 1960s.
